member.name: CHANGER_PRODUCT_DATA
member.summary: Represents product data for a changer device. It is used by theIOCTL_CHANGER_GET_PRODUCT_DATA control code.

member.name: CHANGER_PRODUCT_DATA.VendorId
member.summary: The device manufacturer's name. This is acquired directly from the device inquiry data.

member.name: CHANGER_PRODUCT_DATA.ProductId
member.summary: The product identification, as defined by the vendor. This is acquired directly from the device inquiry data.

member.name: CHANGER_PRODUCT_DATA.Revision
member.summary: The product revision, as defined by the vendor.

member.name: CHANGER_PRODUCT_DATA.SerialNumber
member.summary: A unique value used to globally identify this device, as defined by the vendor.

member.name: CHANGER_PRODUCT_DATA.DeviceType
member.summary: The device type of data transports, as defined by SCSI-2. This member must be FILE_DEVICE_CHANGER.
